data.title: Prescription for Herbal Medicine

medications_or_items.name: Metformin
medications_or_items.instructions: 1 tablet orally twice daily with meals.

data.recommendations: Dietary: Follow a balanced diet rich in whole foods and low in processed sugars; drink at least 8 glasses of water per day. Lifestyle: Engage in regular physical activity (at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days); practice stress-reduction techniques such as meditation or yoga. Safety/Follow-up: Monitor any side effects from herbal medications and report any adverse reactions immediately; next appointment on November 8, 2025. Validity/General advice: Prescription is valid until October 8, 2025 unless otherwise specified; always consult with a healthcare professional before starting any new treatment or changing existing therapies.

Prescription for Herbal Medicine

Date: October 8, 2025
Patient Name: John Doe
Patient ID: 123456
Date of Birth: January 15, 1970

Prescribing Practitioner
Name: Dmitriy Mekh
License Number: 789456
Contact Information: codemekh@gmail.com

Diagnosis
Primary Diagnosis: Type 2 Diabetes
Secondary Conditions: Hyperlipidemia

Medicine Prescription
Metformin — Dosage: 500 mg; Form: Tablet; Duration: 4 weeks; Instructions: 1 tablet orally twice daily with meals.
Atorvastatin — Dosage: 10 mg; Form: tablet; Duration: Ongoing; Instructions: 1 tablet orally at bedtime.

Additional Instructions
Dietary Recommendations:
- Follow a balanced diet rich in whole foods and low in processed sugars.
- Drink at least 8 glasses of water per day.
Lifestyle Modifications:
- Engage in regular physical activity (at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days).
- Practice stress-reduction techniques such as meditation or yoga.

Follow-Up
Next Appointment: November 8, 2025
Comments: Monitor any side effects from herbal medications. Report any adverse reactions immediately.

Signature
Signature
Dmitriy Mekh
License Number: 789456

Note: This prescription is valid until October 8, 2025, unless otherwise specified. Always consult with a healthcare professional before starting any new treatment or making changes to existing therapies.
